name: Spaceship (Pedrox2017)
description:
Basic Controls

A - Look to the left

D - Look to the right

W (While looking to the Front Pad) - Look up

S (While looking to the Vents) - Look down

Advanced Controls

Cooler
Z - Activate
X - Deactivate

Engine Button
Z - Deactivate
X - Activate
Helpful Controls

Q (Front Pad) - Increase distance + heat

R (Vents) - Increase oxygen + cool
